name: pph
description: Pond house accommodation website in Phimai, Thailand

scripts.clean: rimraf --no-glob --force node_modules package-lock.json .astro dist .vite .cache .turbo .next .nuxt .output && npm cache clean --force
scripts.clean:windows: taskkill /f /im node.exe 2>nul || true && rimraf --no-glob --force node_modules package-lock.json .astro dist .vite .cache .turbo .next .nuxt .output && npm cache clean --force
